ygData.subject: SK Quest armor (Questions and spoiler/rumors)
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone on the list play on the Test Server?  I ve heard that the new quest armor was broken on Test, but I assume will be fixed before tomorrow.  If
ygData.messageBody:
Does anyone on the list play on the Test Server? I've heard that the
new quest armor was broken on Test, but I assume will be fixed before
tomorrow. If anyone can post logs of talking to the quest giver I'd
love to hear it. Here's what I've heard:

The quest is given by a Greater Skeleton in the Graveyard of Mistmoore.
It requires pieces of Decayed Armor found off Lizard Crusaders in
Cazic Thule. I don't yet know what else is required, but I assume
that there is either more items or monetary components (metals or
gems) involved.

I have not seen stats or screenshots of how it looks. I can't
believe they made the rogue armor look like plate. It could have
the exact same stats, but I think black leather would have been
more fitting.

Xilith
